How can I get information about the Verus blockchain using the command line?

You can get information about the Verus blockchain using the `getblockchaininfo` command in the Verus CLI. Here's an example:

```
verus getblockchaininfo
```

This command will provide information about the current state of the blockchain.

Examples: > verus getblockchaininfo > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getblockchaininfo", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
